LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart.label: slime heart (Unconf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with correct configuration and the addition of materials it is able to grow a real slime. It's a lost technology from Obsidia, developed by mad scientist and slime master Rimuru Tempest.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Honey.label: honey slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Honey.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Honey slime in 5 days. Honey slime produces 40 Raw Honey every 10 days.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Jelly.label: jelly slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Jelly.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Jelly slime in 5 days. Jelly slime produces 400 Insect Jelly every 10 days.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_RoyalJelly.label: royal jelly slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_RoyalJelly.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Jelly slime in 5 days. Royal jelly slime produces 25 Royal Jelly every 10 days.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.

LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Bone.label: bone slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Bone.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Bone slime in 5 days. Bone slime battle type, with increased intelligence for training.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Demon_Acid.label: acid demon slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Demon_Acid.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Acid demon slime in 5 days. Acid demon slime ranged battle type, with increased intelligence for training.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.

LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Demon_Cryo.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Cryo demon slime in 5 days. Cryo demon slime ranged battle type, with increased intelligence for training.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.

LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Demon_Toxic.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Toxic demon slime in 5 days. Toxic demon slime ranged battle type, with increased intelligence for training.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Waste.label: waste slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Waste.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Waste slime in 5 days. Waste slime special type, that has developed for eating Toxic wastepacks.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Companion_Worker.label: worker companion slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Companion_Worker.descripti: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Worker companion slime in 5 days. Worker companion slime special type, that has developed an ability to enhance working skills of anyone they bond with.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Companion_Battle.label: battle companion slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Companion_Battle.descripti: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Battle companion slime in 5 days. Battle companion slime special type, that has developed an ability to enhance combat skills of anyone they bond with.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Companion_Anima.label: anima companion slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Companion_Anima.descriptio: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Anima companion slime in 5 days. Anima companion slime special type, that has developed an ability to enhance psychic powers of anyone they bond with.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Hauler.label: hauler slime heart (Сonf.)
LanguageData.OE_SlimeHeart_Hauler.description: A hyper-advanced slime core with configuration to grow up into Hauler slime in 5 days. Hauler slime pack type, with high intelligence and exceptional carrying capacity.\n\nWarning! Slime is formed untamed.
